name: GHOSTS'N GOBLINS
synopsis: Renowned as one of the most challenging platform games of all time, Ghosts'n Goblins pits brave knight, Arthur on a hair-raising journey to rescue his beloved princess from her supernatural captors. Arm yourself with weapons like the Javelin, Dagger or Axe, and battle your way through six monster-infested stages until the final confrontation with the Devil himself! But beware the Devil's tricks. The princess may be further than you think...
